retained.title: Retained
retained.description:
Retained when true implies that the tax amount will be retained
by the buyer on behalf of the supplier, and thus subtracted from
the invoice taxable base total. Typically used for taxes related to
income.

rate_required.title: Rate Required
rate_required.description:
RateRequired when true implies that when a tax combo is defined using
this category that one of the rates must be defined.

rates.title: Rates
rates.description: Specific tax definitions inside this category.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description: Codes defines a set of regime specific code mappings.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description:
Meta contains additional information about the category that is relevant
for local frequently used formats.

Category.description: Category contains the definition of a general type of tax inside a region.

name.title: Name
name.description: Short name for the key, if relevant.

desc.title: Description
desc.description: Description offering more details about when the key should be used.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description:
Codes defines a set of codes that may be used within a given regime or format
that will help identify which key definition to use.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Any additional data that might be relevant in some regimes.

KeyDefinition.description: KeyDefinition defines properties of a key that is specific for a regime.

types.title: Types
types.description: The types of sub-documents supported by the regime

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Stamps that must be copied from the preceding document.

corrections.title: Corrections
corrections.description: Corrections contains a list of all the keys that can be used to identify a correction.

correction_methods.title: Correction Methods
correction_methods.description: CorrectionMethods describe the methods used to correct an invoice.

PrecedingDefinitions.description: PrecedingDefinitions contains details about what can be defined in Invoice preceding document data.

key.title: Key
key.description: Key identifies this rate within the system

exempt.title: Exempt
exempt.description:
Exempt when true implies that the rate when used in a tax Combo should
not define a percent value.

values.title: Values
values.description:
Values contains a list of Value objects that contain the
current and historical percentage values for the rate and
additional filters.
Order is important, newer values should come before
older values.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description: Codes defines a set of regime specific code mappings.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description:
Meta contains additional information about the rate that is relevant
for local frequently used implementations.

Rate.description: Rate defines a single rate inside a category

zones.title: Zones
zones.description: Only use this value if one of the zones matches.

since.title: Since
since.description: Date from which this value should be applied.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description: Percent rate that should be applied

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: When true, this value should no longer be used.

RateValue.description: RateValue contains a percentage rate or fixed amount for a given date range.

zone.title: Zone
zone.description:
Specific Locality, region, city, province, county, or similar code inside
the country, if needed.

zones.title: Zones
zones.description: List of sub-zones inside a country.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description:
Tags that can be applied at the document level to identify additional
considerations.

identity_types.title: Identity Types
identity_types.description:
Identity types specific for the regime and may be validated
against.

charge_types.title: Charge Types
charge_types.description: Charge types specific for the regime and may be validated or used in the UI as suggestions

payment_means.title: Payment Means
payment_means.description:
PaymentMeansKeys specific for the regime that extend the original
base payment means keys.

item_keys.title: Item Keys
item_keys.description:
ItemKeys specific for the regime that need to be added to `org.Item` data
in line rows.

scenarios.title: Scenarios
scenarios.description: Sets of scenario definitions for the regime.

Regime.description: Regime defines the holding structure for the definitions of taxes inside a country or territory.

tags.title: Tag
tags.description: Tag that was applied to the document

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the scenario for further information.

note.title: Note
note.description: A note to be added to the document if the scenario is applied.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description:
Codes is used to define additional codes for regime specific
situations.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Any additional local meta data that may be useful in integrations.

Scenario.description: Scenario is used to describe a tax scenario of a document based on the combination of document type and tag used.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Partial or complete schema URL for the document type

list.title: List
list.description: List of scenarios for the schema

ScenarioSet.description: ScenarioSet is a collection of tax scenarios for a given schema that can be used to determine special codes or notes that need to be included in the final document.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the zone to be use if a locality or region is not applicable.

locality.title: Locality
locality.description:
Village, town, district, or city name which should coincide with
address data.

region.title: Region
region.description: Province, county, or state which should match address data.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description: Codes defines a set of regime specific code mappings.

Zone.description: Zone represents an area inside a country, like a province or a state, which shares the basic definitions of the country, but may vary in some validation rules.
